notes: Double clicking the item casts it on self.
Applies a cyclone effect on the target upon cast, turning it invulnerable and fully disabled.
Unlike other Cyclone abilities, the duration of Wind Waker's cyclone is not affected by status resistance.
Applies a basic dispel on the target upon cast.
Cyclone first applies the invulnerable, then the dispel.
Unlike Euls, Wind Waker's Cyclone can target any unit, excluding wards, or buildings.
When targeting self, when in the air, the caster may move the cyclone at 350 movement speed, while maintaining invulnerability and vertical displacement.
While in the air, the cycloned unit has no collision. However, a pathing blocker is created at the base of the cyclone within a 24 radius.
The damage is applied at the end of the duration. If the cyclone gets dispelled, it still applies the damage as soon as the target lands.
The damage is only applied to enemy targets.
Can be cast on Roshan, but has no effect, since Roshan is immune to forced movement. The damage is still applied.
abilities.description: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or allied units. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
itemBehaviour:
(Spell_immunity_block_partial_symbol)^Partially pierces spell immunity
Can be cast on self while spell immune
Cannot be cast on spell immune enemies.

additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 420 mana and 7.75 mana regen.
For agility heroes, it grants 420 mana and 7.75 mana regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 420 mana, 7.75 mana regen and 35 attack damage.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple Wind Waker fully stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.
name: Wind Waker
description: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.
